snippet.title: Necrofugitive - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: Check out the twisted trailer for Necrofugitive, an upcoming 2D stealth-action game about an evil shapeshifter on the run from justice. Survive a world forged through Medieval history with merciless pursuers, daring escapes, and an ancient mystery driving your every move. A demo for Necrofugitive is available now on Steam.
